summary: This appears to be a brief, informal email or message fragment from July 24, 2019, expressing frustration about being asked to forward information related to Jeffrey Epstein to someone with the initials 'IM', questioning why this task wasn't handled by the recipient's boss.

events.title: Message about Epstein information
events.description: An individual expresses frustration in a message about being instructed to send information regarding Jeffrey Epstein to 'IM', questioning why the recipient's boss isn't handling it.

keyFacts: The document is a message dated July 24, 2019, referencing Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender is frustrated about being told to send Epstein-related information to an individual with the initials 'IM'.
The sender questions why the recipient's boss is not performing this task instead.
